channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- gitbook node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- gitbook node module

item.title: CVE-2017-16019|2024-08-05T20:13:06.672Z -- hackerone -- gitbook%20node%20module
item.description: GitBook is a command line tool (and Node.js library) for building beautiful books using GitHub/Git and Markdown (or AsciiDoc). Stored Cross-Site-Scripting (XSS) is possible in GitBook before 3.2.2 by including code outside of backticks in any ebook. This code will be executed on the online reader.
